#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>

using namespace std;
char num[55];
char ans[55];
void solve()
{
    scanf("%s", num);
    bool ok = 1;
    for(int i=0; i<strlen(num); i++)
    {
        if(num[i] == '2' || num[i] == '3' ||num[i] == '4'|| num[i] == '5' || num[i] == '7')
        {
            ok=0;
            break;
        }
        else
        {
            if(num[i]== '6') ans[strlen(num)-i-1]= '9';
            else if(num[i] == '9')ans[strlen(num)-i-1] = '6';
            else ans[strlen(num)-i-1] = num[i];
        }

    }
    ans[strlen(num)]= '\0';
    if(ok)printf("YES\n%s\n", ans);
    else printf("NO\n");
}

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif

    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {
        solve();
    }
}
